Secrets in this RSA are congruential
The polynomial and the beautiful
Make up relations in this world
Hey

And be colourful
Because this RSA is wonderful

crypto.name: nestDLP
crypto.desc:
So I leap
And swim against polynomial stream
To show you what I’ve achieved
Going deep
Tonight we’ll make DLP a feast
Just count it on me
Just count it on me

misc.name: Residue
misc.desc:
We always try hard to edit prompts to push LLMs, but have you ever thought about how they work?

The attachment can be downloaded from the link below:

https://pan.baidu.com/s/1ekomfbzwqnvQykVGY6caYw?pwd=5454

Access password: 5454
Or through Google Drive

misc.name: Sky Is Ours
misc.desc:
John likes to choose window seats on airplanes. He took this photo on a plane on April 10, 2025. What was his flight number?

The final flag is LilacCTF{flight number}.
Note: The flight number should be the actual operating flight number, in all capital letters.
